Uses of Interface
net.metarelate.terminology.coreModel.TerminologySet

Packages that use TerminologySet
net.metarelate.terminology.coreModel This is the core of the Terminology Model and the overall conceptualization id described in the main documentation, that we refer to http://reference.metoffice.gov.uk/data/wmo/docs/. 
net.metarelate.terminology.publisher Components to drive the rendering and publication of the terminology 
 

Uses of TerminologySet in net.metarelate.terminology.coreModel
 

Classes in net.metarelate.terminology.coreModel that implement TerminologySet
 class TerminologySetTDBImpl
          A jena-TDB based implementation of @see TerminologySet .
